mapper.insert: INSERT INTO paper (title, guidename, prayname, respname, offername, ccm1, ccm2, ccm3, ccm4, resp, long_label, chapter, start, fin, notice, notice1, notice2, notice3, speachname, nprayname, nrespname, noffername, createdAt) VALUES (#{title}, #{guidename}, #{prayname}, #{respname}, #{offername}, #{ccm1}, #{ccm2}, #{ccm3}, #{ccm4}, #{resp}, #{long_label}, #{chapter}, #{start}, #{fin}, #{notice}, #{notice1}, #{notice2}, #{notice3}, #{speachname}, #{nprayname}, #{nrespname}, #{noffername}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT A.book, A.chapter, A.paragraph, A.sentence FROM bible AS A JOIN paper AS B WHERE B.idx=#{idx} AND A.long_label=B.long_label AND A.chapter=B.chapter AND A.paragraph BETWEEN B.start AND B.fin
SELECT A.label, A.paragraph, A.sentence FROM versicle AS A JOIN paper AS B WHERE B.idx=#{idx} AND A.paragraph=B.resp
